paragraphs.content: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
paragraphs.contentHtml: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:

paragraphs.content: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.

paragraphs.content: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
paragraphs.contentHtml: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

paragraphs.content: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
paragraphs.contentHtml: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,

paragraphs.content: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.

paragraphs.content: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.

paragraphs.content: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
paragraphs.contentHtml: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,

paragraphs.content: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.

paragraphs.content: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;

paragraphs.content: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

paragraphs.content: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

paragraphs.content: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;

paragraphs.content: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

paragraphs.content: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

paragraphs.content: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
